CustomField.description: Select a pre-defined SOQL filter from the dropdown to specify which records will be processed by this job. Choosing a well-defined filter (e.g., targeting specific fields, dates or conditions) optimizes the job’s performance and reduces execution time. Ensure the selected filter aligns with the job’s requirements.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select a pre-defined SOQL filter from the dropdown to specify which records will be processed by this job. Choosing a well-defined filter (e.g., targeting specific fields, dates or conditions) optimizes the job’s performance and reduces execution time. Ensure the selected filter aligns with the job’s requirements.
CustomField.label: Filter Criteria (Master Object)
